title: Chapter 550
body:
Chapter 550

550 Kill all of them

“Little brat, you’re quite arrogant. Kill him!”

...

The old corpse guard waved his hand.

Immediately, a Lv 3 martial King realm corpse guard controlled a Lv 3 martial King realm refined corpse and charged toward Lu Ming.

Bang!

Lu Ming lifted his leg and kicked the corpse guard, sending it flying at least a thousand meters away. It crashed into a cliff and almost shattered it. The corpse guard lay there, motionless.

Everyone was dumbfounded.

A Lv 3 martial King realm refined corpse had been crippled by Lu Ming’s kick. Was it still a refined corpse with copper skin and iron bones? When did he become so weak?

Lv 4 martial King realm. You’re at Lv 4 martial King realm.

That old corpse guard called out.

They were shocked to see that he had reached Lv 4 martial King realm at such a young age.

The eyes of the young woman and the others also lit up.

With the addition of a Lv 4 martial King realm lower tier, they might have a chance to escape.

“Little brother, come and help me. Let’s rush out together!”

The peak Lv 4 martial King realm man shouted.

However, Lu Ming did not seem to hear it. He smiled faintly and said,”Why are you rushing out? It’ll be fine after we kill them!”

With that, Lu Ming walked towards the old corpse guard step by step.

“Little brat, so what if you’re a Lv 4 martial King? You want to kill me? in your dreams!”

The old corpse guard roared and immediately controlled a Lv 4 martial King realm corpse guard to kill Lu Ming.

Five to six pitch-black iron chains shot towards Lu Ming.

A faint smile hung on Lu Ming’s lips. He stretched out his hand and grabbed all five to six iron chains. Then, he activated the Thunder concept and his arm shook.

Zzzzzzz …

The power of the Thunderbolt followed the iron chain and headed toward the LV 4 martial King realm refined corpse.

Bang!

The refined corpse was turned into charcoal by the power of lightning.

“You …”

This time, the old corpse Guard’s expression changed. His originally shriveled and pale face turned ashen, and his eyes flashed with horror.

How was it possible for him to defeat a Lv 4 martial King realm refined corpse so easily?

This young man’s combat strength was too strong.

The eyes of the young woman and the others lit up. Perhaps, they would be saved today.

“You’re the Ditian Divine Guard, you’re the genius of the Ditian Divine Guard!”

The old corpse guard shouted.

To have such cultivation and battle prowess at such a young age, he could only be a top genius among the Ditian divine guards.

“You’re right!”

Lu Ming smiled faintly.

“Hehehe, it’s worth it to be able to kill a genius of the Ditian Divine Guard today! Do it!”

The old corpse guard sneered and suddenly roared. His voice spread far and wide.

Hu! “Hu!”

In the next moment, from the East and West, there was a loud sound as coffins flew over.

There were more than 20 coffins on each side, and there were more than 50 coffins in total.

“Ambush, there’s an ambush!”

At this moment, the young woman’s group of six faces were as pale as paper and filled with despair.

“Young hero, leave quickly, don’t worry about us!”

The young woman shouted.

Lu Ming smiled faintly. This young woman was kind.

However, this was within Lu Ming’s expectations.

more than fifty corpse guards. En, it’s a good thing I still have quite a few soul-sealing crystals on me. After I seal the soul and bring it back, those will all be rewards!

Lu Ming thought to himself.

Sealing the souls of the heavenly corpse sect’s corpse guards and obtaining rewards wasn’t limited to the scaled demon plane.

It was the same in other places. As long as one killed a corpse guard, sealed its soul, and took it back, there would be a reward.

“Young hero, let’s go!”

Seeing that Lu Ming was standing still, the young woman became anxious.

“It’s too late to leave now!”

The old corpse guard sneered.

&Nbsp; hu hu …

The coffins from two different directions flew over everyone’s heads. They formed a dark mass and blocked the sunlight from the sky.

Bang!

At this moment, Lu Ming stomped on the ground and his figure soared into the sky.

“He’s trying to escape, stop him!”

The old corpse guard shouted.

A few iron chains flew out from one of the coffins and wrapped around Lu Ming. He waved his hand and sent them flying. Lu Ming then rushed into the sky.

“Escape? who’s escaping?”

Lu Ming’s calm voice was heard.

The next moment, Lu Ming looked down from above and took a step forward.

After taking one step, he took another step.

BOOM! BOOM! BOOM!

Lu Ming took three consecutive steps.

Nine Dragons heaven trampling steps, three steps in a row.

BOOM!

The entire world seemed to be about to explode as a terrifying power surged towards the coffins.

Bang! Bang! Bang!

More than 50 coffins exploded as if they were made of paper. One figure after another emerged from the coffins.

Some corpse guards with weaker cultivation had their bodies directly explode and died on the spot.

Some of the corpse guards with stronger cultivation also vomited large mouthfuls of blood.

“Ten thousand Dragon kill!”

Lu Ming’s long spear shook as the three concepts converged. At least a few hundred spear gleams shot out and turned into a few hundred three-colored true dragons that pounced at the corpse guards.

???!

Screams rang out continuously, regardless of whether they were at the second, third, or even fourth or fifth level martial King realm.

The three-colored true dragon tore his body apart, and his body fell to the ground like rain.

For a moment, only some of the stronger refined corpses stood in the sky, unmoving like wood.

More than fifty corpse guards were all killed in an instant.

Below, everyone was stunned. They stopped fighting and stared at the sky with all their might. They were completely petrified.

Heavens, more than 50 corpse guards, including more than a dozen Lv 4 and Lv 5 martial King corpse guards, were all killed in an instant.

Not a single one escaped.

What kind of combat strength was this? Could it be a late stage King tier?

But, such a young late stage King tier? How many were there in the Tianxuan region?

Everyone felt that their minds were a little confused.

“Ah, ah, monster, monster, run, run!”

After a while, the old corpse guard reacted and screamed in fear, frantically escaping to the side.

But-

Whoosh!

A ray of spear light descended from the sky and nailed him to the ground.

Whoosh … Whoosh …

Immediately after, Spears descended and nailed the other corpse guards to the ground, leaving no one alive.

Then, Lu Ming waved his hand and more than fifty soul-sealing crystals flew out, sealing the souls of all the corpse guards and putting them away.

“There are only these soul-sealing crystals left. If we kill more corpse guards, we won’t have any more soul-sealing crystals.”

Lu Ming sighed.

If he had known earlier, he would have bought more soul-sealing crystals and brought them with him.

After keeping it, Lu Ming moved and appeared beside the young woman and the rest.

“Greetings, Lord Divine Guard!”

Other than the lady, the rest of them quickly saluted Lu Ming.

Such a young and powerful Ditian Divine Guard must have an extraordinary status in the Ditian divine Palace. Thus, they were naturally very respectful.

there’s no need to be so polite, everyone. I just happened to pass by. The heavenly corpse sect and the Ditian divine guards are mortal enemies. Since I’ve seen them, I naturally won’t let them off!

Lu Ming said with a smile.

“Lord Divine Guard, you’re so powerful. Your name is Xuan Xiang, I wonder what’s the name of Lord Divine Guard?”

The young woman’s eyes lit up as she looked at Lu Ming.

It was the first time she had seen such a young and powerful genius.

“I’m lu Ming!”

Lu Ming said with a smile.
